core.algorithm

Interface ISteganographyAlgorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LSBAlgorithm, RawLSBAlgorithm

    public interface ISteganographyAlgorithm
    Represents a steganography algorithm, algorithm to hide/extract data inside a medium
    Author:
    Jaisse Grela

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getEmbeddedData()
      Gets the hidden message
      ICoverMessage getStegoObject(IMessage embeddedData)
      Gets the stego-object results from applying this algorithm to the cover message and the embedded data
      double getStegoObjectRate(IMessage embeddedData)
      Gets the rate of the space that will be occupied for a message inside the cover message, this rate is non-negative and if it was greater than 1 the message can not be hidden inside this cover message
      boolean hasHiddenMessage()
      Gets if the medium has a hidden message

    • Method Detail

      • hasHiddenMessage

        boolean hasHiddenMessage()
        Gets if the medium has a hidden message
        Returns:
        true if the medium contain a message, false otherwise

      • getStegoObject

        ICoverMessage getStegoObject(IMessage embeddedData)
        Gets the stego-object results from applying this algorithm to the cover message and the embedded data
        Parameters:
        embeddedData - data to hide
        Returns:
        the stego-object

      • getStegoObjectRate

        double getStegoObjectRate(IMessage embeddedData)
        Gets the rate of the space that will be occupied for a message inside the cover message, this rate is non-negative and if it was greater than 1 the message can not be hidden inside this cover message
        Parameters:
        embeddedData - data to hide
        Returns:
        the message space rate

      • getEmbeddedData

        byte[] getEmbeddedData()
        Gets the hidden message
        Returns:
        the hidden message
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - - if no hidden data
